sect1.title: git rm and git mv
sect1.para: git rm. This removes a file and let Git know about it. Various options allow to select whther the file is only deleted in the index or both in the index and the working directory. Note that you need to commit (and possibly push) for the removal to appear in the repository.
git mv. This renames or moves a file and lets Git know about it. Again, you need to commit (and possibly push) for the change to appear in the repository.
